3. Fifth component of complement: This is a specific protein involved in the immune system's response to infections. A deficiency in this protein can lead to an increased susceptibility to certain infections.
4. Complement: This is a group of proteins that work together to help eliminate pathogens from the body. A deficiency in one or more of these proteins can lead to a variety of immune-related diseases.
